objects.description: Monitor for API calls that may search for common password storage locations to obtain user credentials. Analytic 1 - Suspicious API calls related to password manager access. index=security sourcetype IN ("WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational", "linux_secure", "macos_secure") EventCode IN (1, 11, 4688) (api IN ("CryptUnprotectData", "OpenProcess", "ReadProcessMemory", "EnumProcesses", "EnumProcessModules") OR CommandLine IN ("*keepass*", "*lastpass*", "*1password*", "*bitwarden*", "*dashlane*", "*passwordsafe*"))
